name: Project Sword
description:
Grab your sword and make your way swiftly running across floating islands and old temples, slashing terrible creatures with stylish tricks and vaults.

DEVELOPED BY:

GENTLE PUFFERFISH

(EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 2, 2021/2022)

  • Matteo Bologna
  • Francesco Cimino

Game Design:

  • Alessandro Robbiano
  • Stefano Testa
  • Andrea De Luca

3D Art:

  • Luca Cucciniello
  • Rodolfo Beccalli

Concept Art:

  • Gaia Negri
